A4.text: Spanish is the official language of Argentina, Bolivia (co-official with 36 indigenous languages), Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Cuba, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, Mexico (co-official with 63 indigenous languages), Nicaragua, Panama, Paraguay (co-official with Guaran√≠), Peru (co-official with Quechua, Aymara, and 'the other indigenous languages'), Puerto Rico (co-official with English), Uruguay, and Venezuela.
